name: radioactivity_concentration_of_78As_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "As" means the element "arsenic" and "78As" is the isotope "arsenic-78" with a half-life of 6.32e-02 days.
